body.p: The BSD# Project is devoted to porting the Mono .NET framework and applications to the FreeBSD operating system.

During the past six months, the BSD# Team continued to track the Mono development and the lang/mono port was updated to version 2.4.2, the latest stable version of Mono (skipping version 2.2 because of some regressions in this release).
In the meantime, many other related ports have been updated or added. These ports include:

ul.li: www/xsp and www/mod_mono that make it possible to use FreeBSD for hosting ASP.NET application;
multimedia/moonlight, an Open Source implementation of Microsft SilverLight;
lang/mono-basic, the Visual Basic.NET Framework for Mono;

help.task: Test mono ports and send feedback (a special attention to environments where NO_PORTSDOC / WITH_DEBUG is set has to be taken).
Build a debug live-image of FreeBSD so that Mono hackers without a FreeBSD box can help us fixing bugs more efficiency.
